titleStmt.title: A tract on the Sabbath-Day wherein the keeping of the first-day of the week a Sabbath is justified by a divine command and a double example contained in the Old and New Testament : with answers to the chiefest objections made by the Jewish seventh-day Sabbatharians and others / by Isaac Marlow.
titleStmt.author: Marlow, Isaac.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.A. and are to be sold by H. Barnard ... and by Hannah Smith ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
